Class: ImageStyle

This documentation is for OpenLayers v10.5.0. The latest is v.

ol/style/Image~ImageStyle 


import ImageStyle from 'ol/style/Image.js';

A base class used for creating subclasses and not instantiated in apps. Base class for Icon, CircleStyle and RegularShape.

new ImageStyle(options)
